amendment.description: To modify a provision relating to interim compensation payments for Glacier Bay, Alaska.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1775 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1775 proposed by Senator Burns for Senator Stevens. (consideration: CR S11816-11819; text: CR S11818) To modify a provision relating to interim compensation payments for Glacier Bay, Alaska.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1775 proposed by Senator Burns for Senator Stevens.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1775 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
